conbody.p: The Triple'A Plus Design Studio User Guide is intended to provide conceptual information about the Design Studio Workbench, along with detailed instructions for using the application's tools and modules. This guide assumes that users are familiar with Triple'A Plus product. The information provided applies to all users, including technical users. ESE: Source file name is spelled incorrectly. Source file is named "IntentedAudience", should be "IntendedAudience".
